segments.text: Would you like to stretch your legs ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The seats are excellent . We're right in the center .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a new concert hall and the acoustics are great .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is this your first time to come to a symphony concert ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In the United States , yes . But back in China , I went to concerts a couple of times with my parents .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have large concert halls in your city ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have two . One is like this one . The other is a little smaller .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . Well , we'd better get back to our seats . It's about to start .
segments.speaker: S1
